title: SV Coding Regions Benchmark Pipeline Parameters
description: Comprehensive SV calling and benchmarking pipeline for multiple sequencing technologies

fasta.description: Path to reference genome FASTA file
fasta.help_text: Reference genome in FASTA format. Will be indexed if FAI index is not provided.

fasta_fai.description: Path to FAI index of reference genome (optional)
fasta_fai.help_text: If not provided, will be automatically generated from the FASTA file.

illumina_wes_bam.description: Path to Illumina WES BAM file (optional)
illumina_wes_bam.help_text: Illumina whole-exome sequencing BAM file for short-read SV calling.

illumina_wgs_bam.description: Path to Illumina WGS BAM file (optional)
illumina_wgs_bam.help_text: Illumina whole-genome sequencing BAM file for short-read SV calling.

pacbio_bam.description: Path to PacBio HiFi BAM file (optional)
pacbio_bam.help_text: PacBio HiFi long-read BAM file for long-read SV calling.

ont_bam.description: Path to Oxford Nanopore BAM file (optional)
ont_bam.help_text: Oxford Nanopore long-read BAM file for long-read SV calling.

vcf_baseline.help_text: Ground truth VCF file for benchmarking SV calls. Must be bgzipped and indexed.

high_confidence_targets.description: Path to high-confidence regions BED file (optional)
high_confidence_targets.help_text: BED file defining high-confidence genomic regions for focused analysis.

gene_panel_targets.description: Path to gene panel BED file (optional)
gene_panel_targets.help_text: BED file defining gene panel regions for targeted analysis.

wes_utr_targets.description: Path to WES with UTR regions BED file (optional)
wes_utr_targets.help_text: BED file defining exome capture regions including UTRs.

wes_sequencing_targets.description: Path to WES sequencing target regions BED file (optional)
wes_sequencing_targets.help_text: Bgzipped and tabix-indexed BED file (.bed.gz) with exome target regions. Used by Manta's --callRegions parameter to restrict variant calling to sequencing targets. The .tbi index will be auto-detected.

tandem_repeats.description: Path to tandem repeats BED file (optional)
tandem_repeats.help_text: BED file with tandem repeat regions for filtering or annotation.

skip_pbsv.description: Skip PBSV calling (for test data without proper PacBio headers)
skip_pbsv.help_text: PBSV requires proper PacBio BAM headers. Set to true when using test data.

skip_benchmarking.help_text: Set to true to only run SV calling without benchmarking.

simulate_targets.help_text: Simulate random combinations of genes to assess robustness.

num_simulations.help_text: Number of random target sets to generate and benchmark.

gencode_gtf.description: Path to GENCODE GTF annotation file (required for simulation)
gencode_gtf.help_text: GTF file with gene annotations for extracting gene coordinates.

gather_statistics.help_text: Run analysis workflow to aggregate results and create visualizations.

truvari_refdist.help_text: Maximum distance between SV breakpoints for comparison.

truvari_pctsize.description: Minimum percent of SV size similarity (0-1)
truvari_pctsize.help_text: Variants must have at least this percent size similarity to be matched.

truvari_pctseq.help_text: Variants must have at least this percent sequence similarity to be matched.

truvari_pctovl.help_text: Variants must have at least this percent reciprocal overlap to be matched.

outdir.help_text: The output directory where the results will be saved. Defaults to launch directory with run name.

run_name.help_text: Used to name output directory and reports.

conda_cache_dir.help_text: Location where conda environments will be cached for reuse.

generic_options.title: Generic Options
generic_options.description: Less common options for the pipeline

tracedir.description: Directory to keep pipeline execution trace files

plaintext_email.description: Send plain-text email instead of HTML

max_cpus.description: Maximum number of CPUs that can be requested

max_memory.description: Maximum amount of memory that can be requested

max_time.description: Maximum amount of time that can be requested
